description.value:
Fires hooked/magnetic grapple attached to 100m of wire. Can climb or use powered winch. Usually fired from Bolt Pistol. Can act as a crude Projectile weapon (1d10 + 2 R, Pen 2)

Effect: Initiated

Notes: 3 R
